channel.title: 🔎 Incident Investigation on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in 🔎 Incident Investigation on Analyst

item.title: 🗒 Methodology
item.description: First, have a template for an IR/forensics sheet. This can be done in Excel or other program alike.

item.title: 📸 Collection
item.description: Triage Collection Across Enterprise Powershell is the best tool to automate and scale evidence collection accross the enterprise.

item.title: 🖥 System Information
item.description: Windows Installed programs and applications Key 🔑: Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Uninstall. There can be some data for programs that do not exist on the system anymore.

item.title: 🎫 Permissions and Policies
item.description: Windows Group policies macOS iOS Android AWS IAM - Identity and Access Management. By default - no permissions.

item.title: 🪦 Backups
item.description: Windows Volume Shadow Copies and Restore \System Volume Information\ Shadow Copies are exactly those pieces of data that get saved on disk when system restore option is enabled.

item.title: ⛅️ Cloud Storage
item.description: Windows For OneDrive the most useful artifacts are stored locally. If you get access to the account online - may see the deleted items and their versions.
